bioAsHtml: Guillaume Laforge is the project lead of the Groovy project, a dynamic language for the JVM. He works for Restlet, where he lead the Product leadership and the developer relations. Guillaume co-authored the Groovy in Action book, and he's speaking regularly at conferences around the world on Groovy, Domain-Specific Languages and REST Web APIs.

acceptedTalks.title: A Groovy journey in Open Source land
Les Cast Codeurs - En direct de Devoxx
The never-ending REST API design debate

bio: Guillaume Laforge is the project lead of the Groovy project, a dynamic language for the JVM. He works for Restlet, where he lead the Product leadership and the developer relations. Guillaume co-authored the Groovy in Action book, and he's speaking regularly at conferences around the world on Groovy, Domain-Specific Languages and REST Web APIs.
